WebsiteCreationFAQ.title: Frequent {br} {span}
WebsiteCreationFAQ.description: Find clear answers on website creation, SEO and our digital support in Marrakech.

faqs.q: Why use a website creation agency in Marrakech?
faqs.a: A specialized agency in website creation Marrakech understands the specific needs of local businesses. It offers solutions adapted to the Marrakech market, whether for tourism, real estate or trade.

faqs.q: What is the price of website creation in Marrakech?
faqs.a: The price varies according to the complexity of the project (showcase, e-commerce, custom). We offer personalized quotes adapted to your budget and growth objectives.

faqs.q: What type of website should I choose for a business in Marrakech?
faqs.a: It depends on your activity. A Riad will need a showcase site with booking, while a craftsman can benefit from an online store. We advise you on the best strategy.

faqs.q: How long does website creation in Marrakech take?
faqs.a: On average, a showcase site takes 2 to 4 weeks, while a complex e-commerce site can require 6 to 8 weeks. We commit to clear deadlines from the start.

faqs.q: How to optimize the SEO of a website in Marrakech?
faqs.a: We integrate SEO from conception: technical structure, local keywords ('Marrakech', 'Morocco'), loading speed and content optimized for Google.

faqs.q: Can I modify my site after website creation in Marrakech?
faqs.a: Absolutely. We provide training to manage your content, or we can handle maintenance and developments via our support packages.

faqs.q: What host should I choose for website creation in Marrakech?
faqs.a: We recommend high-performance and secure hosts, with servers close to your target audience to guarantee maximum speed.

faqs.q: Can a website boost a business in Marrakech?
faqs.a: Yes, by increasing your local and international visibility. It's an essential tool for capturing tourist and local clientele in Marrakech.

faqs.q: Do I need a multilingual site for website creation in Marrakech?
faqs.a: To target a tourist clientele (French, English, Spanish), a multilingual site is highly recommended and we perfectly master these integrations.

faqs.q: How to choose a good agency for website creation in Marrakech?
faqs.a: Check their portfolio, client reviews and technical expertise. Choose an agency that understands your market and offers long-term support.

maroc.title: Web Agency - Website Creation Morocco
maroc.subtitle: National Excellence
maroc.desc: Our agency masters all website creation solutions, from turnkey CMS to custom developments. In Marrakech and throughout Morocco, we combine the power of WordPress/Elementor for fast projects with pure coding (HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript and PHP) for complex needs. Each project natively integrates: optimized SEO for Google Morocco, loading times under 1.5 seconds thanks to our local Casablanca hosting, and reinforced security (SSL certificates and anti-DDoS protection).

marrakech.title: Website Creation Marrakech: Premium Solutions
marrakech.subtitle: Luxury & Tourism
marrakech.desc: In Marrakech, our expertise focuses on unique hybrid solutions. For riads and hotels: we design WordPress sites with Elementor Pro integrating booking systems (SynXis or custom API developments), 360° virtual tours optimized for mobile, and automatic synchronization with Booking/Expedia. Marrakchi particularity: our developers systematically integrate interactive maps of the souks.

casablanca.title: Casablanca: E-Commerce & Business Hub
casablanca.subtitle: Business & Marketplaces
casablanca.desc: Leader in website creation in Casablanca, we build high-performance WooCommerce marketplaces. Our solutions include: multi-warehouse management, integration with Moroccan ERPs (SAP, Odoo), and optimized payment tunnels (CMI/PayZone). Locally hosted infrastructure for latency <20ms.

rabat.title: Rabat: Institutional & Government Sites
rabat.subtitle: Corporate & Security
rabat.desc: Our approach in Rabat combines security and modularity. We develop W3C certified portals with biometric authentication and automatic archiving. Bilingual admin interface and intelligent caching system to handle government traffic peaks.

tanger.title: Tangier: Export & Logistics Platforms
tanger.subtitle: International Trade
tanger.desc: For Tanger Med and free zones, we design multilingual platforms (FR/AR/EN/ES) with real-time customs duty calculators and automatic currency modules. Hybrid WordPress/Node.js solutions for maximum flexibility.

agadir.title: Agadir: Tourist & Sports Experiences
agadir.subtitle: Tourism & Surf
agadir.desc: In Agadir, we focus on visual immersion: 4K templates, video backgrounds, and interactive maps of surf/golf spots. Integration of weather/tide APIs and 'Lonely Planet' style content strategy to maximize organic traffic.
